text: @Talkmaster I will definitely look back on these times fondly, as the fucking idiots who are pretending COVID-19 is no big deal & a Dem hoax & an attempted offense against Christianity are the ones who are going to be removing themselves from society. Brighter days are ahead without you! 🌞
